sentences.en: " I acted mighty mean to - day, Becky, and I'm so sorry.
sentences.cn: “ 贝基, 我很抱歉,今天那样做实在对不起人.

sentences.en: " Well , why don't you ? Becuz you know mighty well you can't.
sentences.cn: “ 喂,得了吧, 那你搞来给我看看呀.你是抓不到的.

sentences.en: A tiny insect , trying to shake a mighty tree, is ludicrously ignorant of its own weakness.
sentences.cn: 蚍蜉撼大树, 可笑不自量.

sentences.en: Being paper money, it rotted away mighty fast.
sentences.cn: 由于是纸币，所以烂得很快。

sentences.en: He gave the donkey a mighty prod in the backside.
sentences.cn: 他用力捅了一下驴屁股。

sentences.en: He struck him with a mighty blow across his shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他猛一下砸在他的肩膀上。

sentences.en: I think you're a bit too high and mighty yourself.
sentences.cn: 我认为你自己就有些过于盛气凌人。

sentences.en: It's something you'll be mighty proud of.
sentences.cn: 这是你们将会非常引以为豪的事情。

sentences.en: The east wind blows with mighty power.
The entire metropolitan center possessed a high and mighty air calculated to overawe and abash the common applicant.
sentences.cn: 整个市中心区有着一种高傲的神气,好像故意要让一些前来寻找职业的普通人感到惶恐不安.

sentences.en: The press mogul befriended the high and mighty in Britain.
sentences.cn: 这位报界大亨和英国的显贵达人们交情甚好。

sentences.en: To her it was a wonderful conglomeration of everything great and mighty.
sentences.cn: 在她看来,那里奇妙地聚集着所有伟大和非凡的事业.

sentences.en: You go and show her a thing or two , bring her down a peg and see if she can still be so high and mighty.
sentences.cn: 你去给她点脸色看, 让她下不了台,看她还能神气活现?

sentences.en: You think you are one of the high and mighty, remember pride goes before a fall.
sentences.cn: 你自以为是了不起的人物, 别忘了骄者必败.

words.tran_cn: 可以；或许（may的过去式）；应该

trans.tran_cn: 趾高气扬，巨大的，强有力的，浩瀚的
trans.tran_en: very strong and powerful, or very big and impressive
